name: @briebug/ngrx-entity-schematic
description: An Angular schematic for quickly scaffolding NgRx Entities with actions, effects, reducer, model, service, and passing specs.
author: Kevin Schuchard <schuchard.kevin@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-app && git clean -fd sandbox-app
scripts.test: yarn clean:build:launch briebug --init --path src/app/state && yarn test:sandbox && yarn clean
scripts.test:ci: yarn clean:build:launch briebug --init --path src/app/state && yarn test:sandbox && yarn clean
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox-app && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn e2e && yarn build
scripts.link:schematic: yarn link && cd sandbox-app && yarn link @briebug/ngrx-entity-schematic
scripts.release: yarn clean && yarn build:schematic && yarn np
